name: Dendro Slime
description:
A slime that has undergone ecological changes due to abundant Dendro in its environment.
It has also taken on the weaknesses of the Dendro element, and will burn intensely the moment it meets a bright flame.

investigation.name: Slime
investigation.description: A pudgy elemental life form.\nIt's said that desserts made from slimes of different elements will have incredibly distinctive flavors.
